'''Unnamed Wolvendom Soundtrack 1''' ''(unofficial name)'' is an unreleased soundtrack. 

It plays when entering combat in [[Wolvendom]] with any enemy besides [[Andrius (Weekly Boss)|Andrius]] after the special weather condition near Andrius' arena has taken effect.
